description:
Opinionated balance by the dev
The original ruleset for this game.
Includes custom cards

description_i18n.en:
Opinionated balance by the dev
The original ruleset for this game.
Includes custom cards
description_i18n.ru:
Баланс, продуманный разработчиками.
Оригинальные правила для этой игры.
Включает пользовательские карты.
description_i18n.fr:
Équilibrage opiniâtre par le développeur
Règles originales de ce jeu.
Inclut des cartes personnalisées.

sigils.Acupuncture: Pay 3 bones: Choose a creature to gain the Stitched sigil and give this card Armor.

Acupuncture_i18n.en: Pay 3 bones: Choose a creature to gain the Stitched sigil and give this card Armor.

sigils.Airborne: A card bearing this sigil will strike an opponent directly, even if there is a creature opposing it.

Airborne_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will strike an opponent directly, even if there is a creature opposing it.

sigils.Amalgamation: A card bearing this sigil assimilates the owner's other creatures, gaining their health, power and sigils.

Amalgamation_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil assimilates the owner's other creatures, gaining their health, power and sigils.

sigils.Annoying: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil gains 1 Power.

Annoying_i18n.en: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil gains 1 Power.

sigils.Ant Spawner: When a card bearing this sigil is played, an ant is created in your hand.

Ant Spawner_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, an ant is created in your hand.

sigils.Armored: The first time a card bearing this sigil would take damage, prevent that damage.

Armored_i18n.en: The first time a card bearing this sigil would take damage, prevent that damage.

sigils.Attack Conduit: Other creatures within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil gain 1 power.

Attack Conduit_i18n.en: Other creatures within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil gain 1 power.

sigils.Battery Bearer: When a card bearing this sigil is played, it provides an energy cell to its owner.

Battery Bearer_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, it provides an energy cell to its owner.

sigils.Bees Within: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, a Bee is created in your hand.

Bees Within_i18n.en: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, a Bee is created in your hand.

sigils.Bellist: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Chime is created on each empty adjacent space. A card bearing this sigil will perform a retaliatory attack against any card striking a Chime.

Bellist_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Chime is created on each empty adjacent space. A card bearing this sigil will perform a retaliatory attack against any card striking a Chime.

sigils.Bifurcated Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left and right of the space across from it.

Bifurcated Strike_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left and right of the space across from it.

sigils.Blood Lust: When a card bearing this Sigil attacks an opposing creature and it perishes, this card gains 1 power.

Blood Lust_i18n.en: When a card bearing this Sigil attacks an opposing creature and it perishes, this card gains 1 power.

sigils.Blue Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a blue gem to its owner.

Blue Mox_i18n.en: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a blue gem to its owner.

sigils.Bomb Latch: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Detonator sigil.

Bomb Latch_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Detonator sigil.

sigils.Bomb Spewer: When a card bearing this sigil is played, fill all empty spaces with explode bots.

Bomb Spewer_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, fill all empty spaces with explode bots.

sigils.Bomb Spewer (Eternal): When a card bearing this sigil is played, fill every empty space opposing a card with an explode bot.

Bomb Spewer (Eternal)_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, fill every empty space opposing a card with an explode bot.

sigils.Bone Digger: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will generate 1 bone.

Bone Digger_i18n.en: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will generate 1 bone.

sigils.Bone King: When a card bearing this sigil dies, 4 bones are awarded instead of 1.

Bone King_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil dies, 4 bones are awarded instead of 1.

sigils.Boneless: When a card bearing this sigil dies, no bones are awarded.

Boneless_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil dies, no bones are awarded.

sigils.Brittle: After attacking, a card bearing this sigil perishes.

Brittle_i18n.en: After attacking, a card bearing this sigil perishes.

sigils.Brittle Latch: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Brittle sigil.

Brittle Latch_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Brittle sigil.

sigils.Burrower: When an empty space would be struck, a card bearing this sigil will move to that space to receive the strike instead.

Burrower_i18n.en: When an empty space would be struck, a card bearing this sigil will move to that space to receive the strike instead.

sigils.Corpse Eater: If a creature that you own perishes by combat, a card bearing this sigil in your hand is automatically played in its place.

Corpse Eater_i18n.en: If a creature that you own perishes by combat, a card bearing this sigil in your hand is automatically played in its place.

sigils.Dam Builder: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Dam is created on each empty adjacent space.

Dam Builder_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Dam is created on each empty adjacent space.

sigils.Depleting: When a card bearing this sigil is played, 2 energy cells are removed from its owner

Depleting_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, 2 energy cells are removed from its owner

sigils.Detonator: When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 10 damage.

Detonator_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 10 damage.

sigils.Detonator (5): When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage.

Detonator (5)_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage.

sigils.Disentomb: Pay 1 bone to create a skeleton in your hand.

Disentomb_i18n.en: Pay 1 bone to create a skeleton in your hand.

sigils.Disentomb (Corpses): Pay 2 bones to create a withered corpse in your hand.

Disentomb (Corpses)_i18n.en: Pay 2 bones to create a withered corpse in your hand.

sigils.Double Death: When another creature you own dies, it is returned to life and dies again immediately.

Double Death_i18n.en: When another creature you own dies, it is returned to life and dies again immediately.

sigils.Double Strike: A card bearing this Sigil will strike the opposing space an extra time when attacking.

Double Strike_i18n.en: A card bearing this Sigil will strike the opposing space an extra time when attacking.

sigils.Energy Conduit: If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, your energy never depletes.

Energy Conduit_i18n.en: If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, your energy never depletes.

sigils.Energy Conduit (+3): If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, your maximum energy increases by 3.

Energy Conduit (+3)_i18n.en: If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, your maximum energy increases by 3.

sigils.Energy Gun: Pay 1 energy to deal 1 damage to the creature across from a card bearing this sigil.

Energy Gun_i18n.en: Pay 1 energy to deal 1 damage to the creature across from a card bearing this sigil.

sigils.Energy Sniper: Pay 1 energy, this card's owner chooses an opposing creature to take 1 damage.

Energy Sniper_i18n.en: Pay 1 energy, this card's owner chooses an opposing creature to take 1 damage.

sigils.Energy Gun (Eternal): Pay energy to damage the opposing creature until it dies or you run out.

Energy Gun (Eternal)_i18n.en: Pay energy to damage the opposing creature until it dies or you run out.

sigils.Enlarge: Pay 2 bones to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

Enlarge_i18n.en: Pay 2 bones to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

sigils.Enlarge (3): Pay 3 bones to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

Enlarge (3)_i18n.en: Pay 3 bones to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

sigils.Fecundity: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in your hand.

Fecundity_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in your hand.

sigils.Fecundity (Kaycee): When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in your hand without this sigil.

Fecundity (Kaycee)_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in your hand without this sigil.

sigils.Fledgling: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 1 turn on the board.

Fledgling_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 1 turn on the board.

sigils.Fledgling 2: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 2 turns on the board.

Fledgling 2_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 2 turns on the board.

sigils.Frozen Away: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature inside is released in its place.

Frozen Away_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature inside is released in its place.

sigils.Gem Animator: Mox cards on the owner's side of the board gain 1 power.

Gem Animator_i18n.en: Mox cards on the owner's side of the board gain 1 power.

sigils.Gem Dependant: If a card bearing this sigil's owner controls no mox cards, a card bearing this sigil perishes.

Gem Dependant_i18n.en: If a card bearing this sigil's owner controls no mox cards, a card bearing this sigil perishes.

sigils.Gem Detonator (5): When Mox cards on the owner's side of the board die, they Detonate (the creature opposing them, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage).

Gem Detonator (5)_i18n.en: When Mox cards on the owner's side of the board die, they Detonate (the creature opposing them, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage).

sigils.Gem Guardian: When a card bearing this sigil is played, all Moxa cards on the owners' side of the board gain Nano Armor.

Gem Guardian_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, all Moxa cards on the owners' side of the board gain Nano Armor.

sigils.Great Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green, orange, and blue gem to its owner.

Great Mox_i18n.en: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green, orange, and blue gem to its owner.

sigils.Green Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green gem to its owner.

Green Mox_i18n.en: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green gem to its owner.

sigils.Guardian: When an opposing creature is placed opposite to an empty space, a card bearing this sigil will move to that empty space.

Guardian_i18n.en: When an opposing creature is placed opposite to an empty space, a card bearing this sigil will move to that empty space.

sigils.Handy: When a card bearing this sigil is played, discard your hand then draw a new hand of 4 cards.

Handy_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, discard your hand then draw a new hand of 4 cards.

sigils.Hefty: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil. creatures in the way will be pushed in the same direction.

Hefty_i18n.en: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil. creatures in the way will be pushed in the same direction.

sigils.Hoarder: When a card bearing this sigil is played, you may search your deck for any card and take it into your hand.

Hoarder_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, you may search your deck for any card and take it into your hand.

sigils.Leader: Creatures adjacent to a card bearing this sigil gain 1 Power.

Leader_i18n.en: Creatures adjacent to a card bearing this sigil gain 1 Power.

sigils.Looter: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, draw a card for each damage dealt.

Looter_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, draw a card for each damage dealt.

sigils.Made of Stone: A card bearing this sigil is immune to the effects of touch of death, stinky, annoying and Steel Trap.

Made of Stone_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil is immune to the effects of touch of death, stinky, annoying and Steel Trap.

sigils.Many Lives: When a card bearing this sigil is sacrificed it does not perish.

Many Lives_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is sacrificed it does not perish.

sigils.Marrow Sucker: Pay 2 bones to heal a card bearing this sigil.

Marrow Sucker_i18n.en: Pay 2 bones to heal a card bearing this sigil.

sigils.Mental Gemnastics: When a card bearing this sigil is played, you draw cards equal to the amount of mox cards on your side of the board.

Mental Gemnastics_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, you draw cards equal to the amount of mox cards on your side of the board.

sigils.Mighty Leap: A card bearing this sigil will block an opposing creature bearing the airborne sigil.

Mighty Leap_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will block an opposing creature bearing the airborne sigil.

sigils.Music Player: A card bearing this sigil plays a song of your choice when played

Music Player_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil plays a song of your choice when played

sigils.Noble Sacrifice: A card bearing this sigil is counted as 2 blood rather than 1 blood when sacrificed.

Noble Sacrifice_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil is counted as 2 blood rather than 1 blood when sacrificed.

sigils.Orange Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides an orange gem to its owner.

Orange Mox_i18n.en: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides an orange gem to its owner.

sigils.Omni Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike all opposing spaces.

Omni Strike_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will strike all opposing spaces.

sigils.Power Dice: Pay 1 energy to set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.

Power Dice_i18n.en: Pay 1 energy to set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.

sigils.Power Dice (2): Pay 2 energy to set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.

Power Dice (2)_i18n.en: Pay 2 energy to set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.

sigils.Rabbit Hole: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Rabbit is created in your hand.

Rabbit Hole_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Rabbit is created in your hand.

sigils.Reconstitute: A card bearing this sigil returns to your hand 2 turns after it persihes.

Reconstitute_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil returns to your hand 2 turns after it persihes.

sigils.Repulsive: If a creature would attack a card bearing this sigil, it does not.

Repulsive_i18n.en: If a creature would attack a card bearing this sigil, it does not.

sigils.Ruby Heart: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a ruby mox is created in its place.

Ruby Heart_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a ruby mox is created in its place.

sigils.Scavenger: While a card bearing this sigil is alive on the board, opposing creatures also grant you Bones upon death.

Scavenger_i18n.en: While a card bearing this sigil is alive on the board, opposing creatures also grant you Bones upon death.

sigils.Sentry: When a creature moves into the space opposing a card bearing this sigil, they are dealt 1 damage.

Sentry_i18n.en: When a creature moves into the space opposing a card bearing this sigil, they are dealt 1 damage.

sigils.Sharp Quills: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, the striker is then dealt a single damage point.

Sharp Quills_i18n.en: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, the striker is then dealt a single damage point.

sigils.Shield Latch: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Armored sigil.

Shield Latch_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Armored sigil.

sigils.Side Hustle: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, draw a card from your side deck for each damage dealt.

Side Hustle_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, draw a card from your side deck for each damage dealt.

sigils.Skeleton Crew: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a skeleton in its old space.

Skeleton Crew_i18n.en: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a skeleton in its old space.

sigils.Skeleton Crew (Yarr): At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a pirate skeleton in its old space.

Skeleton Crew (Yarr)_i18n.en: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a pirate skeleton in its old space.

sigils.Sniper: You may choose which opposing card a card bearing this sigil strikes.

Sniper_i18n.en: You may choose which opposing card a card bearing this sigil strikes.

sigils.Spawn Conduit: Empty spaces within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil spawn L33pB0ts at the end of the owner's turn.

Spawn Conduit_i18n.en: Empty spaces within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil spawn L33pB0ts at the end of the owner's turn.

sigils.Sprinter: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil.

Sprinter_i18n.en: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil.

sigils.Squirrel Shedder: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a squirrel in their old space.

Squirrel Shedder_i18n.en: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a squirrel in their old space.

sigils.Steel Trap: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature opposing it perishes as well. A Pelt is created in your oppenent's hand.

Steel Trap_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature opposing it perishes as well. A Pelt is created in your oppenent's hand.

sigils.Stinky: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil loses 1 Power.

Stinky_i18n.en: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil loses 1 Power.

sigils.Stimulate: Pay 3 energy to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

Stimulate_i18n.en: Pay 3 energy to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

sigils.Stimulate (4): Pay 4 energy to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

Stimulate (4)_i18n.en: Pay 4 energy to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.

sigils.Stitched: Whenever a card bearing the Acupuncture sigil is damaged, this card recieves that damage, and the Acupuncture card recieves 1 damage instead.

Stitched_i18n.en: Whenever a card bearing the Acupuncture sigil is damaged, this card recieves that damage, and the Acupuncture card recieves 1 damage instead.

sigils.Tentacle: Includes effect of Waterborne. In addition, a card bearing this sigil will transform into a random tentacle at the start of each turn.

Tentacle_i18n.en: Includes effect of Waterborne. In addition, a card bearing this sigil will transform into a random tentacle at the start of each turn.

sigils.Thick: A card bearing this sigil is juicy, and takes up 2 spaces.

Thick_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil is juicy, and takes up 2 spaces.

sigils.Touch of Death: When a card bearing this sigil damages another creature, that creature perishes.

Touch of Death_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil damages another creature, that creature perishes.

sigils.Transformer: At the beginning of your turn a card bearing this sigil will transform to, or from, Beast mode.

Transformer_i18n.en: At the beginning of your turn a card bearing this sigil will transform to, or from, Beast mode.

sigils.Trifurcated Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left, right, and center of it.

Trifurcated Strike_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left, right, and center of it.

sigils.True Scholar: If you have a blue gem, sacrifice a card bearing this sigil to draw 3 cards.

True Scholar_i18n.en: If you have a blue gem, sacrifice a card bearing this sigil to draw 3 cards.

sigils.Unkillable: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in your hand.

Unkillable_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in your hand.

sigils.Unkillable (Eternal): When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in your hand without this sigil.

Unkillable (Eternal)_i18n.en: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in your hand without this sigil.

sigils.Vessel Printer: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, draw a card from your side deck.

Vessel Printer_i18n.en: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, draw a card from your side deck.

sigils.Warded: A card bearing this sigil takes only 1 damage from attacks and card effects.

Warded_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil takes only 1 damage from attacks and card effects.

sigils.Waterborne: A card bearing this sigil submerges itself during its opponent's turn. while submerged, opposing creatures attack its owner directly.

Waterborne_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil submerges itself during its opponent's turn. while submerged, opposing creatures attack its owner directly.

sigils.Worthy Sacrifice: A card bearing this sigil is counted as 3 blood rather than 1 blood when sacrificed.

Worthy Sacrifice_i18n.en: A card bearing this sigil is counted as 3 blood rather than 1 blood when sacrificed.
